data.lyric:
[ti:Bad Habits]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Bad Habits]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bad Habits - Ed Sheeran
[00:00.24]Written by：Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson/Johnny McDaid
[00:00.79]Published by：Ed Sheeran Limited and Sony Music Publishing, Promised Land Music Ltd/Universal Music Publishing Group, Johnny McDaid (IMRO) - Sony Songs LLC (BMI). Used by Permission. All Rights Reserved.
[00:02.64]Produced by：FRED/Johnny McDaid/Ed Sheeran
[00:03.06]Additional production by：PARISI
[00:03.31]Mixed by：Mark “Spike” Stent at The Mixsuite LA/UK, assisted by Matt Wolach
[00:04.17]Engineered by：Graham Archer/FRED/Johnny McDaid
[00:04.60]Assistant Engineering: Will Reynolds
[00:04.84]Vocals by：Ed Sheeran
[00:05.09]Backing Vocals by：FRED/Ed Sheeran
[00:05.46]Vocal Production: Graham Archer
[00:05.70]Guitar, Drums, Bass, Keys, Piano and Programming by：FRED
[00:06.26]Acoustic Guitar by：Johnny McDaid/Ed Sheeran
[00:06.69]Slide Guitar by：Iain Archer
[00:06.99]Percussion by：Ed Sheeran
[00:07.24]Recorded at：Glemham Hall, Suffolk/The Tree House, Suffolk/Decoy Studios, Suffolk/Fieldwork Studios, London, Promised Land Music Studios, London/Gold Valley Studios, Brighton, Stamford Street, London
[00:08.90]Mastered by：Stuart Hawkes at Metropolis Studios, London
[00:10.75]Every time you come around you know I can't say no
[00:15.59]
[00:18.40]Every time the sun goes down I let you take control
[00:23.21]
[00:26.08]I can feel the paradise before my world implodes
[00:31.05]
[00:33.11]And tonight had something wonderful
[00:39.65]My bad habits lead to late nights ending alone
[00:43.64]Conversations with a stranger I barely know
[00:47.43]Swearing this will be the last but it probably won't
[00:51.24]I've got nothing left to lose or use or do
[00:54.80]My bad habits lead to wide eyes stare into space
[00:58.81]And I know I lose control of the things that I say
[01:02.62]I was looking for a way out now I can't escape
[01:06.41]Nothing happens after two
[01:08.52]It's true it's true
[01:09.98]My bad habits lead to you
[01:12.25]
[01:17.67]My bad habits lead to you
[01:19.78]
[01:25.32]My bad habits lead to you
[01:27.39]
[01:28.90]Every pure intention ends when the good times start
[01:33.61]
[01:36.43]Falling over everything to reach the first times spark
[01:41.24]
[01:44.09]Started under neon lights then it all got dark
[01:48.98]
[01:51.44]I only know how to go too far
[01:57.84]My bad habits lead to late nights ending alone
[02:01.67]Conversations with a stranger I barely know
[02:05.47]Swearing this will be the last but it probably won't
[02:09.29]I've got nothing left to lose or use or do
[02:13.00]My bad habits lead to wide eyes stare into space
[02:16.86]And I know I lose control of the things that I say
[02:20.69]I was looking for a way out now I can't escape
[02:24.47]Nothing happens after two
[02:26.70]It's true it's true
[02:28.14]My bad habits lead to you
[02:30.42]
[02:35.68]My bad habits lead to you
[02:37.91]
[02:45.16]We took the long way round
[02:49.24]
[02:52.39]And burned 'til the fun ran out now
[02:58.63]My bad habits lead to late nights ending alone
[03:02.57]Conversations with a stranger I barely know
[03:06.44]Swearing this will be the last but it probably won't
[03:10.21]I've got nothing left to lose or use or do
[03:13.85]My bad habits lead to wide eyes stare into space
[03:17.91]And I know I lose control of the things that I say
[03:21.66]I was looking for a way out now I can't escape
[03:25.50]Nothing happens after two
[03:27.63]It's true it's true
[03:29.24]My bad habits lead to you
[03:31.20]
[03:36.80]My bad habits lead to you
[03:38.89]
[03:44.28]My bad habits lead to you
data.trans:
[ti:Bad Habits]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Bad Habits]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.24]//
[00:00.79]//
[00:02.64]//
[00:03.06]//
[00:03.31]//
[00:04.17]//
[00:04.60]//
[00:04.84]//
[00:05.09]//
[00:05.46]//
[00:05.70]//
[00:06.26]//
[00:06.69]//
[00:06.99]//
[00:07.24]//
[00:08.90]//
[00:10.75]每次你一出现 你清楚我便已无力抗拒
[00:15.59]
[00:18.40]每当夕阳西落 我便不由自主任你掌控
[00:23.21]
[00:26.08]在我的世界濒临覆灭时 我仿佛置身伊甸乐园
[00:31.05]
[00:33.11]今夜似乎有些不同寻常
[00:39.65]我的坏习惯让我彻夜不眠 与孤独为伴
[00:43.64]与一位我素昧平生的陌生人谈天说地
[00:47.43]我发誓这将是最后一次 而我可能无法兑现承诺
[00:51.24]反正我已一无所有 也不值得托付
[00:54.80]我的坏习惯让我睁大双眼 凝视那空洞虚无
[00:58.81]我知道出口的话 即将不再受控
[01:02.62]我曾苦寻出路 如今却无处可逃
[01:06.41]何必再期待奇迹降临
[01:08.52]罢了罢了 果真如此 
[01:09.98]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
[01:12.25]
[01:17.67]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
[01:19.78]
[01:25.32]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
[01:27.39]
[01:28.90]每当美好拉开序幕 杂念便油然而生
[01:33.61]
[01:36.43]只为初次绽放的绚烂 而倾尽所有
[01:41.24]
[01:44.09]始于霓虹之下 霎那后归于黯然
[01:48.98]
[01:51.44]我只知道该如何义无反顾
[01:57.84]我的坏习惯让我彻夜不眠 与孤独为伴
[02:01.67]与一位我素昧平生的陌生人谈天说地
[02:05.47]我发誓这将是最后一次 而我可能无法兑现承诺
[02:09.29]反正我已一无所有 也不值得托付
[02:13.00]我的坏习惯让我睁大双眼 凝视那空洞虚无
[02:16.86]我知道出口的话 即将不再受控
[02:20.69]我曾苦寻出路 如今却无处可逃
[02:24.47]何必再期待奇迹降临
[02:26.70]罢了罢了 果真如此 
[02:28.14]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
[02:30.42]
[02:35.68]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
[02:37.91]
[02:45.16]我们兜兜转转
[02:49.24]
[02:52.39]分分合合 直至最后一丝温情燃灭
[02:58.63]我的坏习惯让我彻夜不眠 与孤独为伴
[03:02.57]与一位我素昧平生的陌生人谈天说地
[03:06.44]我发誓这将是最后一次 而我可能无法兑现承诺
[03:10.21]反正我已一无所有 也不值得托付
[03:13.85]我的坏习惯让我睁大双眼 凝视那空洞虚无
[03:17.91]我知道出口的话 即将不再受控
[03:21.66]我曾苦寻出路 如今却无处可逃
[03:25.50]何必再期待奇迹降临
[03:27.63]罢了罢了 果真如此 
[03:29.24]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
[03:31.20]
[03:36.80]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
[03:38.89]
[03:44.28]我的坏习惯让我不禁走向你
